@@ -1,1 +267,271 @@``SparseArray.take`` now returns a scalar for scalar input, ``SparseArray`` for others. Furthermore, it handles a negative indexer with the same rule as ``Index`` (:issue:`10560`, :issue:`12796`)

.. code-block:: python

   s = pd.SparseArray([np.nan, np.nan, 1, 2, 3, np.nan, 4, 5, np.nan, 6])
